news.title: U12 Open Training Sessions
news.content:
Our CCYFC U12 team are hosting open training on Saturdays with a focus on preparation & invitations to trials for the next U13 EJA squad 23/24 season.

Contact us to book a space.
news.author: Jamie

news.title: Join us for RACE NIGHT
news.content: We are holding our annual racenight on Friday 24th March. If you would like to to join us or make a donation please get in touch. Tickets and more information available here.
news.author: Sarah
